Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
public class Room extends Object
The Room class represents the hotel room entity in the hotel reservation system. It has a name, which is unique to the hotel, a base price, which is the cost per night, and a list of availability, which represents its availability across the entire month, with respect to the minimum and maximum date reservation value.

    • setName

      Parameters:

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(double price)
      Sets the base price of the room object to the given price value. Pre-condition: price is greater than or equal to 100.0.
      Parameters:
      price - the price to use to set the base price of the room.

    • setAvailability

      public void setAvailability(int startDate, int endDate, boolean available)
      Sets the availability status of the room object for a range of dates in a list based on the provided start and end dates. Pre-condition: startDate is before endDate, and startDate and endDate is within the range of the minimum and maximum date reservation values.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the starting date for which availability of the room object needs to be set.
      endDate - the ending date for which availability of the room object needs to be considered.
      available - the availability status to set the availability of the room object.
